description:
Where the east meets west... hipster bars/brunch and asian markets/dim sum.  Close to the subway, buses, and citibike. Inside, it's spacious and welcoming.  

Plenty of natural light since the unit runs the full length of the building.  French doors lead into the bedroom where there's a queen bed and desk.

Weekly and monthly rates available.  Message to inquire.  Good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with an infant).

Plenty of natural light since the unit runs the full length of the building.  French doors lead into the bedroom where there's a queen bed and desk.  650sqft.

Roof
Apartment is on the top/5th floor of a walk up building

Happy to provide tips as to local attractions, nightlife, and getting around!

A stone's throw to the Lower East Side.

Subway B/D/F, 6, N/Q/R
Bus M15, M15 SBS, M(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)
Citibike station, half block away

If there is a guest arriving the same day as your departure, check out time is 11am in order to clean the apartment before the next guest's arrival.  Otherwise, we have more leeway.
name: Spacious & Stylish Top Floor 1BR (Whole Apt)
review: Das Appartement liegt mitten in Chinatown, die Underground-Stationen Grand St und East Broadway sind nur wenige Schritte entfernt. Ein idealer Ausgangspunkt, um sich Manhattan zu erschließen. Gute Ausstattung. Durch die Nähe zur Manhattan-Bridge ist die Underground über den East-River gut zu hören. Ohrstöpsel sind hilfreich. Die Treppe zum 4. OG erfordert - insbesondere mit Gepäck - etwas Kondition.
